content.rendered:
Introduction

Welcome to the KNG Partners Privacy Policy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information as an affiliate of the KNG Partners program. It also covers the information of players referred by you to us. Please read this policy carefully and in conjunction with our terms and conditions. By visiting our websites or registering an account through our services, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.

Information Collection

We collect personal information when you and/or your referred players use our online gambling services, join our affiliate program, make customer inquiries, register for information or other services, or respond to us. Selected third parties, to whom you and/or your referred players have chosen to disclose personal information, may also provide us with personal information. The types of personal information we may collect include names, email addresses, home addresses, telephone numbers, debit/credit card data, and other information collected upon registration or through online surveys or questionnaires.

Information Processing

Your and/or your referred players’ information may be disclosed for processing to any other companies within our Group and their employees. We may also share personal information with third-party service providers who assist us in providing services such as payment processing, marketing, data verification, and fraud prevention. Any processing performed by recipients will be governed by data processing agreements in accordance with applicable law.

Responsibility towards Referred Players

If you receive and process personal information from players that you refer to us, you must ensure that they have given their express consent for such transfer. You are responsible for processing and transferring personal information from you to us in accordance with relevant laws and under terms no less stringent than those set out in this Privacy Policy. You agree to indemnify us against any claims and associated costs resulting from your breach of this responsibility.

Information Disclosure to Recipients

We ensure that your and/or your referred players’ information is not disclosed to government institutions or authorities unless:

  • We have written consent to share personally identifiable information with third parties.
  • We require personally identifiable information to provide requested services.
  • We respond to subpoenas, court orders, or legal process.
  • We find that your and/or your referred players’ actions on our websites violate our terms of service or usage guidelines.

Additionally, we may disclose and transfer personal data to our payment settlement service providers and financial institutions.

Security

We take the security of your and/or your referred players’ data seriously. We have implemented security policies, rules, and technical measures to protect personal data from unauthorized access, use, disclosure, modification, destruction, or loss. Our employees and data processors are bound by confidentiality obligations.

Cookies

We may use cookies to enhance your and/or your referred players’ experience on our website. Cookies are small files placed on your and/or your referred players’ computer for record-keeping purposes. You can modify your browser settings to refuse cookies, but certain website content may require their acceptance for legitimate security reasons.

Protection of Minors

Our services are not intended for minors or individuals under the age of legal consent. By providing information to us, individuals represent that they are of legal age. We may access and verify the personal information submitted by your referred players. If we become aware of a minor submitting personal information, we may take steps to remove it from our records.

Transfer outside the European Union

We may transfer your and/or your referred players’ personal information to companies located outside the European Union if necessary. In such cases, we will take steps to ensure a similar level of protection is given to the information. We reserve the right to amend or modify this Privacy Policy in accordance with applicable data protection and privacy legislation. By submitting personally identifiable information to us, you and your referred players consent to the use of that information as outlined in this Privacy Policy.

Please check this page regularly for any updates to the Privacy Policy.
